duties_responsibilities.duty: Create & manage project plans as per client s project expectations and align project objectives with company goals.
Developing and monitoring goals, tasks, and plans of development for application development projects.
Interact with the client and lead the client calls, act as a SPOC for the project, and analyze briefs and project requests from clients.
Work closely with Solution Architects/Technical Lead to do effort estimations and converting them into a project plan/release plan.
Participate in discovery workshops, requirement analysis, solution designing, and review of the project artifacts like design document, test plan, test cases.
Lead the development of demos / POCs for the client, participate in client workshops, and ensure that the coding & best Practices are followed when developing & testing the solutions.
Ensure process adherence, manage resource allocation, and keep management and stakeholders up to date with regular status reporting.
Manage and mentor a team of developers and consultants, developing metrics for each project, and fostering partnership with customers/stakeholders/sponsors.
Work with US Public Sector, managing fixed bid projects with revenue of more than 10 M.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
